memberdef.name: HPX_UTIL_ITERATOR_FACADE_INTEROP_HEAD
memberdef.initializer: template <typename Derived1, typename T1, typename Category1, \ typename Reference1, typename Distance1, typename Pointer1, \ typename Derived2, typename T2, typename Category2, \ typename Reference2, typename Distance2, typename Pointer2> \ HPX_HOST_DEVICE prefix \ typename hpx::util::detail::enable_operator_interoperable<Derived1, \ Derived2, result_type>::type \ operator op(iterator_facade<Derived1, T1, Category1, Reference1, \ Distance1, Pointer1> const& lhs, \ iterator_facade<Derived2, T2, Category2, Reference2, Distance2, \ Pointer2> const& rhs)

codeline.highlight: iterator_facade<Derived, T, Category, Reference, Distance, Pointer>&
